Interface ISkiResortItemService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface ISkiResortItemService
    Service interface for item CRUD and rating search methods.

    ivan

      • addSkiItemRatingById

        boolean addSkiItemRatingById(java.lang.String userId,
                             java.lang.String itemId,
                             int rating)
        Add a rating for a certain item evaluated by the user to Recombee database.
        Parameters:
        userId - user evaluated the item
        itemId - id of the item
        rating - rating in integer scale from 1 to 5 (will be transformed to -1.0..+1.0)
        Returns:
        true if rating was added successfully, false otherwise
        Throws:
        com.recombee.api_client.exceptions.ApiException

      • getEvaluatedItemsWithRating

                                                          int rating)
        Get all items with the rating for a given user.
        Parameters:
        userId - target user id
        rating - rating of all items should be equal to this rating that user have askedfor
        Returns:
        items with rating equal to the given
